title: THOUGHT / THE DESTROYER
description: Pain Threshold turns you into THE DESTROYER! (a thought for punching and not taking damage). Anti-Object Task Force.

dialogueTree.title: Pain Threshold: "Bent metal, broken glass... your pa..."
dialogueTree.english: Bent metal, broken glass... your path lies strewn with the broken forms of everyday objects...
dialogueTree.polish: Pogięty metal, potłuczone szkło... Twoja droga poznaczona jest zniszczonymi przedmiotami codziennego użytku...
dialogueTree.belarusian: Замяты метал, пабітае шкло... Твая дарога пазначана знішчанымі прадметамі штодзённага ўжытку...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You are *The Destroyer*, the bane o..."
links.english: You are *The Destroyer*, the bane of inanimate matter.

links.title: You: "Gaze upon me, stuff, and despair!"
links.english: Gaze upon me, stuff, and despair!
links.polish: Patrzcie na mnie, rzeczy, i rozpaczajcie!
links.belarusian: Паглядзіце на мяне, рэчы, і роспачце!

links.title: You: "No, I'm just a disempowered individ..."
links.english: No, I'm just a disempowered individual trying to take my disempowerment out on everyday objects.
links.polish: Nie, jestem tylko bezradnym człowiekiem próbującym wyładować gniew tej bezradności na przedmiotach codziennego użytku.
links.belarusian: Не, я толькі бездапаможны чалавек, які спрабуе выліць гнеў гэтай бездапаможнасці на прадметы штодзённага ўжытку.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Look! There's a discarded milk cart..."
links.english: Look! There's a discarded milk carton on the floor. Why don't you destroy that, too?
links.polish: Patrz! Na podłodze leży pusty karton po mleku. Może jego też zniszczysz?
links.belarusian: Глядзі! На падлозе ляжыць пусты кардон ад малака. Можа, яго таксама знішчыш?

links.title: You: "Good idea. Fuck you, milk carton, t..."
links.english: Good idea. Fuck you, milk carton, this is all *your* fault!
links.polish: Dobry pomysł. Pierdol się, kartonie, to wszystko *twoja wina*!
links.belarusian: Добрая ідэя. Ідзі ты, каробка, гэта ўсё *твая віна*!

links.title: You: "No, I actually feel sorry for the t..."
links.english: No, I actually feel sorry for the things I've destroyed. (I'm sorry, milk carton.)
links.polish: Nie, prawdę mówiąc, to żal mi tych rzeczy, które zniszczyłem (wybacz mi, kartonie po mleku).
links.belarusian: Не, шчыра кажучы, мне шкада тых рэчаў, якія я знішчыў (дараваў мне, кардон ад малака).

links.title: Pain Threshold: "You're right, that's definitely not..."
links.english: You're right, that's definitely not the behaviour of a destroyer at all. That's just severe anger-management problems and a disregard for property rights.
links.polish: Masz rację, to ani trochę nie jest zachowanie niszczyciela, a po prostu poważne upośledzenie radzenia sobie z gniewem oraz lekceważenie prawa własności.
links.belarusian: Вы маеце рацыю, гэта ні кроплі не знішчальнае паводзіны, а проста сур'ёзныя цяжкасці ў змаганні з гневам і грэбаванне правам уласнасці.
